lines.text: If the Lord had meant us not to panic, he wouldn't have given us clean trousers!
I don't like the sounds of this.
Sir, if the Lord had meant us to like everything we heard, he wouldn't have given us commercial radio.
Today General E.F. "Gizzard" Pemberley died when a bomb exploded under his bed. Two eighteen-year-old marines also died.
All these rumours of a food shortage are nonsense. I mean, the fact I have a dead dog in my fridge doesn't mean anything. Why shouldn't I have a dead dog in my fridge if I wish?
Yeah, it's a free country.
[pause]
Sorry.
If the Lord had meant us to be sensible, he wouldn't have given us credit cards.
Neutral countries have two options - medium or well done.
[Cyclops has been shot]
Oh, God. I have sinned. I have sinned!
Hush. He may hear you.
Everything went well, sir, the lobotomy wasn't necessary.
Well, I should think not. Anyone who tries to give me a lobotomy will get a piece of my mind!
President Cyclops issued a statement that all citizens are to conserve oil. In response, Sammy Davis Junior fired six of his hairdressers.
You had me shot just to get public sympathy?
Sir, this will blow your popularity through the roof. Henesy and his Democrat rats won't know what hit them.
[cut to a news broadcast]

Waves of letters of sympathy have been set after one of the most shocking and horrific acts in recent memory. Presidential candidate Jimmy Hennessy was run over by a speeding ambulance outside his home and had both his legs crushed. The ambulance contained President Johnny Cyclops, who was said to have only received flesh wounds after being shot at a TV taping this afternoon.
The mystery of the missing Quark Bomb has been solved. It was seen going off twenty minutes ago in what used to be Israel.
If the Lord had meant us to rely on geriatrics; he wouldn't have given us the supreme court.
The president shouldn't be disturbed.
Well, this one is.
I'm Jay Garrick, but for how much longer?
You think you're so tough?
Tougher than you can handle, Russkie.
We shall see.
[pause]
Boris, help, my back's gone again.
We're gonna crash!
Sorry, sir, I was just following government policy.
What are you talking about?
Fuel conservation. I only filled the tank half-way up!
It's the 3am News. I'm Jay Garrick and you're an insomniac.
The Prime Minister thinks he's Superman! We can't keep this up, I mean look at this note, "Can't make Question Time, Brainiac's escaped from the phantom zone"!
[on tape we see Lacrobat disguised as a Swedish man holding an Abba album]

Good day, my name's Olaf Jokkmokk and I am Swedish. Oh dear, I've dropped the keys to my volvo! I represent a firm of dentists, and I first came into contact with Lacrobat last year, to inquire about an estimate for the liquidation of John McEnroe. Since then, he has wiped out five entire chains of rival dentists. That is why I always vouch for Lacrobat.
Of course, phantom of the Opera.
A man carrying a banner saying "The world ends tomorrow" was arrested for leaking information.
I'm Jay Garrick, I hope you are too.
Russia is a great country. Many people like living in Russia. Read this
[he hands over a piece of paper]
"I like living in Russia." So I see ...
Here is a written account by two witnesses...
Right. Anyway ...
And more then ten people can testify that it wasn't written at gun point.
[Pork enters wearing a superman cape and carrying a dog]
I'm feeling under the weather.
[he walks to the window]
Come on Krypto, it's time for your flight round the block.
[he throws the dog out the window]
You know, I feel better already.
I think I've been over-doing things. But I had a talk with the doctor and he gave me some pills to take.
It'll be for the best, Kev. I'm sure it will.
Which doctor is this then Kev?
Doctor Destiny of Earth two. Sure; you know him. He helped me to save Lois Lane in the giant star fish of Atlantis.
Is that you, crown jewel of the universe?
[repeated line]
Police raid a cafe in Brixton.
So, I see we have a smart-arsed parrot on our hands!
Governments toppled, plants installed, or for that very special assassination; why not use Lacrobat?
Lacrobat, also known as the devil. He's called the man of a thousand faces, and I personally recommend number six hundred and four.
[Lacrobat has the Quark Bomb disguised as a giant penis on his car]
Oh, no sir, this isn't pornography.
It sure ain't a tootsy roll!
I must say I like how you deal with the Americans.
Thank you.
We like, how you say, kick them in the balls.
Well ...
Piss all over them.
OK, why is Johnny Cyclops like a two-dollar whore? Every day a new cock up!
That's good. Say; you know how we were these were the most deadly and dangerous nuclear weapon ever made, and we were to guard them with our lives?
Yeah, why?
Nothing. Except, I could have sworn there were six of them.

I believe I have the man just for you. His name is Lacrobat, people call him The Devil. I haven't met him, but he has sent my a demo tape; apparently it's full of testimonials. I'll watch it now, then call you back.
He is a little strange, but effective. By the way, do I tell him who he's working for?
[we cut and see he is talking to The Deacon]
Under no circumstance.
A lie for a lie, a truth for a truth.
I'm Jay Garrick and the world is an oyster.
I'm Jay Garrick and praise him from whom all blessings flow. The Sunday headlines...
I'm Jay Garrick, have another vallium.
If you do not tell us the details of your mission, you can wave goodbye to both your hands.
How can he wave goodbye if you cut them off?
There's no use beating around the bush. I am, secretly, Superman.
[pause]
Superman?
Yes.
[pause]
Bit of a big one, isn't it? Now, you would want some proof, well here it is.
[he takes off his glasses]
Holy mother of Moses.

Hell, Shah Rassim, this is president Johnny Cyclops. You may have noticed I am communicating with you by means of a parrot. This is because what I am about to tell you is of a highly confidential and secretive - are you sure he's getting all this, Deacon? The Quark Bomb has not been stolen by a terrorist. We stole it, and gave it to a terrorist; it's being smuggled to help you regain your rightful perch- throne! And we hope to get you off of that ferry very soon.
And the rest, Mr. President?
P.S. Would you please, eat me?
[Lacrobat has the Quark bomb in a casket]

[in fake French accent]
Open that box, and be damned for all eternity!
I'm sorry, but I have to search it, Mr ...
Floyjoy. Montgomery Hindenberg Floyjoy, undertaker for the stars. Mr. Bob Hope has my on a retail. My card.

[reads]
All the world's a grave, and all the men and women merely stiffs.
So, you say you bury celebrities?
Oui.
Then why's this casket so large?
[pause]
It was a double act.
[repeated line]
The Quark Bomb, formerly known as the Johnny Cyclops Bomb after the President of the same name.
A woman who secured a lock of Frank Sinatra's hair twenty years ago today sold it back to him for an undisclosed sum.
